
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52309730">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 风清扬方丈 于 2025-1-31 10:12 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">　　<strong>大家新年好呀，年初二给各位拜年啦，祝各位新年身体健康，工作顺利，万事如意，开心快乐每一天！</strong></font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 图床资源有点慢，见谅，也可以直接去我原博客看比较流畅。</strong></font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/LaiYun/p/18695293" target="_blank"><font size="4">https://www.cnblogs.com/LaiYun/p/18695293</font></a></font><br>
<font color="#000000">　　<font size="4"><strong>前言</strong>：</font></font><font size="4"><br>
<font color="#000000">　　这几天看到很多DeepSeek的热点新闻（火的不行呀），去了解下这个AI，然后自己试了下本地部署，发现挺简单的，所以记录一下。</font></font><br>
 <br>
<font color="#3366ff">　　<strong><font size="4">本地化部署的好处：不用排队，响应快（需要电脑资源支持哦），不怕DeepSeek服务关闭了导致无法使用。</font></strong></font><br>
<font size="4"> </font><ul><li><font size="4"><strong>准备工具</strong><br>
</font><br>
</li></ul><font size="4"><strong>　　Ollama</strong>：用于简化大型语言模型（LLM）的本地部署和使用，可以同时支持多个大模型，开发者能够方便地在本地环境中运行和测试不同的语言模型，简单的说就是相当于一个容器。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　官网地址：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://ollama.com/" target="_blank">https://ollama.com/</a></font><br>
<font size="4"><strong>　　ChatBox AI</strong>：是一款用于接入各种大模型的客户端，使在大模型AI时方便、美观。就是一个UI客户端，用起来更方便快捷。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　官网地址：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://chatboxai.app/zh" target="_blank">https://chatboxai.app/zh</a></font><br>
<font size="4"><br>
</font><ul><li><strong><font size="5"> <strong>下载安装Ollama</strong></font></strong><br>
</li></ul>　　<br>
<font size="4">首先先下载Ollama，进入官网，点击Download</font><br>
<img id="aimg_GNxSD" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/WsIR2Molm4S6Hyc34l7loK.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/WsIR2Molm4S6Hyc34l7loK.png"><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_eUoWB" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130171634885-568890693.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130171634885-568890693.png"> <font size="4">　　这里选择自己电脑或者服务器的系统，我的是Windows系统就选择了Windows端下载</font><br>
<img id="aimg_d2G5j" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/CQISKr064RSZQi6Oh7KnqY.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/CQISKr064RSZQi6Oh7KnqY.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_o808o" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130171821791-1498952255.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130171821791-1498952255.png">　　<font size="4">这里有些朋友可能会遇到无法下载的问题，我刚开始用IDM下载也卡在90%就一直下不下来，这里提供我下载好的软件包给大家</font><br>
<font size="4">百度网盘链接：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kFH3wUKLdorENBMV57O6CQ" target="_blank">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kFH3wUKLdorENBMV57O6CQ</a><br>
提取码：kbls</font><br>
<font size="4">　　下载好了就是安装了，安装过程我就不截图了，<strong>注意Ollama默认安装是在C盘的，以及下载的大模型数据也是默认在C盘，所以一定要注意自己C盘的存储空间够用</strong>。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　安装好Ollama后Windows+R，输入CMD进入命令窗口</font><br>
<img id="aimg_I8smf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/1qA1kFqL3OY9ruNpLq5S2D.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/1qA1kFqL3OY9ruNpLq5S2D.png"><br>
<br>
<font size="4"><img id="aimg_H9Q6k" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130172721581-1934126188.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130172721581-1934126188.png">输入<strong>：<strong>ollama -v&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></strong>有版本号就说明安装好了，安装好了会自动启动Ollama，在任务栏右下角有个羊驼的图标，这里可以设置好开机启动，这样电脑开机后可以直接使用大模型。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_TXZk5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/xlDrTaGxI1Ib7hdzsi31qf.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/xlDrTaGxI1Ib7hdzsi31qf.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_Eg2mu" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173038776-1639394211.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173038776-1639394211.png"><img id="aimg_JnK5N" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184950960-539197174.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184950960-539197174.png"> <ul><li><strong><font size="5">下载DeepSeek R1模型</font></strong><br>
</li></ul><font size="4">　　在Ollama官网点击Models，选择deepseek-r1</font><br>
<img id="aimg_o2G68" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/P6CHb7WMLLmDZ7kFPQzjCW.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/P6CHb7WMLLmDZ7kFPQzjCW.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_q30Mf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173216080-1368461918.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173216080-1368461918.png"> 　<font size="4">　这里是选择DeepSeek蒸馏后的密集模型，<strong>注意这里的模型要根据自己的电脑性能来下载，如果资源不足，下载了也会跑不起来</strong>，我这里选择的是第一个最小的模型。对应的资源和模型我放个图，大家自己对应下</font><br>
<img id="aimg_QQW77" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/tf6pDBqTshvNdefSoVPipb.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/tf6pDBqTshvNdefSoVPipb.png"><br>
<font size="4">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;感兴趣的自己看看这个对应的模型所需的性能：</font><font size="4"><a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://apxml.com/posts/gpu-requirements-deepseek-r1" target="_blank">https://apxml.com/posts/gpu-requirements-deepseek-r1</a></font><img id="aimg_B5ya5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130183827974-1725451142.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130183827974-1725451142.png"><font size="4"> </font><br>
<img id="aimg_mAAT7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/IDK2I86bbW0YPIKGyPG7Uy.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/IDK2I86bbW0YPIKGyPG7Uy.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_FxHR9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173320428-1938190279.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130173320428-1938190279.png"> 　<font size="4">　</font><br>
<font size="4">　　复制Ollama选中模型对应下载命令，如图所示</font><br>
<img id="aimg_ZHnSa" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/6ImApo5SyHUOYjjEFBS7PJ.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/6ImApo5SyHUOYjjEFBS7PJ.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_NrSL8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184646071-79600657.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184646071-79600657.png"> <font size="4">复制命令到命令窗</font><br>
<img id="aimg_mmgnw" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/ifyymGTe2yuWVdMKmeMoCG.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/ifyymGTe2yuWVdMKmeMoCG.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_h9hUh" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184733472-451781026.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184733472-451781026.png"> <font style="font-size:18px">然后回车开始下载，这里略过下载过程，这里是下载完成后的截图，下载完成后就可以提问了，没想到这么简单吧，哈哈哈</font><font style="font-size:18px"><img id="aimg_gGo2Q" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/OgFXYzS9MFSE5JXX1MAZYu.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/OgFXYzS9MFSE5JXX1MAZYu.png"><br>
</font><img id="aimg_bt9Ft" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184837701-2110757884.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130184837701-2110757884.png"> <ul><li><font size="5"><strong> 安装ChatBox AI并接入DeepSeek</strong><br>
</font><br>
</li></ul> 　　<font size="4">下载ChatBox AI，<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://chatboxai.app/zh" target="_blank">https://chatboxai.app/zh</a>，也可以使用网页版的，这里我下载了客户端，安装过程略过</font><br>
<img id="aimg_NpBip" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/XxamoWtlQyIrjKH1mJD2bx.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/XxamoWtlQyIrjKH1mJD2bx.png"><br>
<font size="4"><img id="aimg_Vxjcg" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185445309-634356655.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185445309-634356655.png"> 　　选择Ollama API后，然后选择我们下载好的DeepSeek模型，这里如果大家还有其他模型也可以选择对应的模型。</font><img id="aimg_Dx79E" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/UfmZVJuTD0nX3nF16L0LOr.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/UfmZVJuTD0nX3nF16L0LOr.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_L1ph8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/ewzNIaTjuEUvXhD5OB0dPQ.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/ewzNIaTjuEUvXhD5OB0dPQ.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_Z07f8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185633692-454580156.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185633692-454580156.png"><img id="aimg_z5062" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185705100-2001511499.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130185705100-2001511499.png"> <font size="4">　　到了这里，我们进行提问，可能会遇到报错</font><br>
<img id="aimg_l00Q2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/7NIsnIhNxmThhLFMM6HpKA.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/7NIsnIhNxmThhLFMM6HpKA.png"><br>
<font size="4"><img id="aimg_Kzdcb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191050906-1020241632.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191050906-1020241632.png">　　这里我们点击我的电脑，右键属性--&gt;高级系统设置--&gt;环境变量</font><br>
<img id="aimg_uerrG" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/QHioHIyMVu2L4wkjyED5IN.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/QHioHIyMVu2L4wkjyED5IN.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_sweCe" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/91zf8m4G7hrBvjViOvzN6Q.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/91zf8m4G7hrBvjViOvzN6Q.png"><br>
<font size="4"><img id="aimg_rf2ZV" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191217275-1649800636.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191217275-1649800636.png"><img id="aimg_UAxiC" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191316247-925018459.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191316247-925018459.png"> 　　新建两个环境变量</font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>　　OLLAMA_HOST：0.0.0.0</strong></font></font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>　　OLLAMA_ORIGING：*</strong></font></font><br>
<font color="#ff0000"><img id="aimg_WXZlX" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="744" height="196" file="https://i.111666.best/image/ZbbknTFAjZhd4yh1t2v85m.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/ZbbknTFAjZhd4yh1t2v85m.png"></font><font color="#ff0000"><img id="aimg_Zfj3p" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="731" height="198" file="https://i.111666.best/image/vgwzhwLvu2pWPdGtMSSHSV.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/vgwzhwLvu2pWPdGtMSSHSV.png"><br>
</font><img id="aimg_eGCHg" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191427984-886973005.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191427984-886973005.png"><img id="aimg_N91xQ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191502556-129418497.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191502556-129418497.png">　<font style="font-size:18px">　设置完环境变量后退出一下Ollama，然后重新启动下Ollama</font><br>
<font style="font-size:18px"><img id="aimg_u3y3Z" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/iqKKCmE1Pz6WnM4svM5BAn.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/iqKKCmE1Pz6WnM4svM5BAn.png"><br>
</font><img id="aimg_eTM0m" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130194314900-563784059.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130194314900-563784059.png"> <font size="4">　　重启Ollama</font><br>
<img id="aimg_MV40V" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/X5hCgmRedzm4OSESQK7Crx.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/X5hCgmRedzm4OSESQK7Crx.png"><font size="4"><br>
</font><img id="aimg_z55AT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/X5hCgmRedzm4OSESQK7Crx.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/X5hCgmRedzm4OSESQK7Crx.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_GWQl0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130194733433-886314624.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130194733433-886314624.png"><ul><li><strong><font size="5">开始提问</font></strong><br>
</li></ul>　　<font size="4">回到ChatBox，到这里就可以开始提问啦，但是我下载的这个最小的模型，貌似知识库有点旧，我问了今天是几月几日，他回答是2023年1月27日，实际今天是2025年1月30日，实际推理能力我没测试，大家可以试试</font><br>
<img id="aimg_TjO6N" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/weP5h88z6gkDBfHI7hnlCe.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/weP5h88z6gkDBfHI7hnlCe.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_EgoUx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/vVpFjAglmrxa6yWyCBXXoV.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/vVpFjAglmrxa6yWyCBXXoV.png"><br>
<br>
<font size="4"><img id="aimg_x2cnr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130190022709-1452926546.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130190022709-1452926546.png"><img id="aimg_WNGzA" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130190112049-613567492.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130190112049-613567492.png"> 　　到这里就完成全部本地化部署了。</font><ul><li><font style="font-size:18pt"><strong>删除大模型资源包</strong></font><br>
</li></ul>　　<font size="4">再讲下如何删除大模型数据包，因为可能有的朋友不听劝或者没注意看模型所需资源要求，导致下载了与自己电脑资源不对应的模型包，电脑无法跑起来。这时候需要删除模型资源包。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　由于这里我已经删除了，我就不附图了，大家安装文字说明来基本就可以完成了　　打开CMD命令窗口，输入Ollama list　　这样就会显示你安装了的所有大模型资源包，复制对应的资源包名称</font><br>
<font size="4">　　再输入：<strong>ollama rm deepseek-r1:1.5b</strong></font><br>
<font size="4"> 　　语法：ollama rm 模型资源包名称</font><br>
<font size="4"> 　&nbsp; &nbsp;这样大模型资源包就删除了，然后Ollama可以在Windows系统程序那里找到正常卸载。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　如果需要在外网使用，大家可以查下如何做内外网穿透。</font><br>
<font size="4">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 还有一个在线调用DeepSeek API的教程，就是在ChatBox这里选择DeepSeek，然后放入自己的DeepSeek API的Key就可以了，现在注册DeepSeek有免费500万token送，但仅限一个月内使用。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_R7bTp" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/isRAFY5tCw2gatQ8jOV6gU.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/isRAFY5tCw2gatQ8jOV6gU.png"><br>
 <font size="4"><img id="aimg_mi4aK" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193034253-796737093.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193034253-796737093.png">　　ChatBox还可以创建自己的智能体，输入智能体名称和人物设定就可以啦。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_CMD4v" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/Ks3TBmSeu8lvAqKGCxCZDJ.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/Ks3TBmSeu8lvAqKGCxCZDJ.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_hx5e1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/TbrO3d73kpbQQAxKaDAuEr.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/TbrO3d73kpbQQAxKaDAuEr.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_OI31u" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193623717-1530738383.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193623717-1530738383.png"><img id="aimg_SUJaI" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193700984-121937571.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193700984-121937571.png"> <font size="4">　　其实还可以语音交流提问的，但这个就要用到Docker容器了，我没测试这方面，具体方式大家可以搜搜哈，也比较简单的。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_x1Dp6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193623717-1530738383.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193623717-1530738383.png"><img id="aimg_XJJ8y" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193700984-121937571.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130193700984-121937571.png"> <font size="4">　　大家可以看看我的原博客，顺便求个关注，谢谢啦！</font><font style="color:rgb(0, 44, 153)"><font face="&amp;quot;"><a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/LaiYun/p/18695293" target="_blank"><font size="4">https://www.cnblogs.com/LaiYun/p/18695293</font></a></font></font><font size="4"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="4">　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　</font>　　　　&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<font size="7"><strong>撒花完结</strong>&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><br>
